# Get access to height and nhanes
```{r}
library(primer.data)

nhanes |>
  select(height) |>
  
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = height)) +
    geom_histogram(color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Height of People in the U.S.", 
       x = "Height in Centimeters",
       y = "Number of People")
```
